_header: If thou would have in mind how brutal is thy kind
Subjects: human life, transitory nature of; transitoriness, of life; mortality
_description: On transitoriness of mortal life — three long monorhyming lines

Bod26.Transcription:
Yf þo wolde habbe in mende how brutel ys þy
                    kende & þenche of þe pyne þat
                    ys wyþ o ȝoten endeþe woldes to logh bryng þe hyghnesse
                    of þy kende
